channel.title: [718/742] Athens - "Knowledge. Wisdom. Prosperity." - Official Release
channel.description:
[center][hr] [b][size=18pt]General Information[/size][/b]
[img]http://puu.sh/9Ufwi/0139291d99.png[/img][img]http://puu.sh/9Ugwr/df6ad7c0f7.png[/img][img]http://puu.sh/9Ugx8/3d5ddccb43.png[/img][img]http://puu.sh/9UgxT/fa7ded548c.png[/img][img]http://puu.sh/9UgyB/084eb1b67b.png[/img][img]http://puu.sh/9Ugze/3f40057c69.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9TWukeZ.gif[/img]
Name: Athens Revision: 718/742 Sort: Economy
Current stage: Official Release
[hr] [b][size=18pt]Development Log[/size][/b]
[b]Latest update: Athens now has Ganodermic Beasts![/b] [code] On August 2nd, 2014, Athens featured Ganodermic Beasts in the manhole near the Gypsy! On August 1st, 2014, Athens features Pest Control! On August 1st, 2014, Athens featured Summoning! On July 31st, Athens featured a custom minigame, The Hunger Games Minigame! On July 31st, 2014, Athens featured Jadinkos. On July 31st, 2014, Athens added the Gnome Glider transportation system. On July 31st, 2014, Athens featured Ice strykewyrms. On July 29th, 2014, Nomad was added for Lords-only. On July 23rd, 2014, the Abyss was added! On July 22nd, 2014, Dungeoneering - Horde mode was added. On July 22nd, 2014, Puro Puro was added. On July 22nd 2014, the longbow sight worked. On July 22nd, 2014, the scroll of cleansing worked. On July 22nd, 2014, the coal bag worked. On July 22nd, 2014, the twisted bird necklace worked. On July 21st, 2014, the gem bag worked. On July 21st, 2014, the bonecrusher worked. On July 21st, 2014, resource dungeons were added. On July 21st, 2014, Athens had a notes system. On July 21st, 2014, jewelry stringing was added. On July 21st, 2014, jewelry smithing was fixed. On July 20th, 2014, Lords got custom teleport animations for home teleport. On July 19th, 2014, bolt enchanting was added. On July 10th, 2014, you could make spirit shields. On July 10th, 2014, you could smith dragonfire shields. On July 9th, 2014, skillcape teleporting was added. On July 9th, 2014, you could melt armour! On July 7th, 2014, more thieving stalls were added to the Thieving area. On July 7th, 2014, the Herblore dungeon was added. On July 6th, 2014, the bury-all option was added to bones. On June 28th, 2014, the Hunter skill was added to Athens. On June 26th, 2014, Server-Forums Integration was put into Athens. On June 23rd, 2014, a lottery system was added to Athens. On June 23rd, 2014, auto-voting was added to Athens. On June 19th, 2014, Athens featured on-spot dueling! On June 18th, 2014, the XP well was added to Athens. On June 17th, 2014, you could duel anywhere. On June 6th, 2014, Athens was a 742 On June 3rd, 2014, skilling interfaces were fixed. On June 3rd, 2014, flax was now accessible via Varrock. On June 3rd, 2014, Athens featured the Dwarf multicannon, along with the Royal and Gold cannons. On June 2nd, 2014, Athens featured notifications when a private message is received. On June 1st, 2014, Athens featured the Spirit Tree. On June 1st, 2014, Athens featured sheep shearing. On June 1st, 2014, Athens featured the rare drop table. On June 1st, 2014, Athens' following was fixed. No longer would players be stuck behind trees forever. On May 28th, 2014, Athens had Bones on Altar added. On May 27th, 2014, Athens had added 2 coal, 2 silver, and 2 mithril ore to the east mine and 2 admantite and 1 runite ore to the west mine of Varrock. On May 27th, 2014, a Thieving place was added at the South-East of Varrock. On May 27th, 2014, the Forinthry Dungeon was added. On May 26th, 2014, Athens had begun. [/code]
[b]Total updates: 51[/b][hr] [b][size=18pt]Staff Team[/size][/b]
[url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=468771]Arham 4[/url] - Owner, Founder, Programmer [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=487613]ox random xi[/url] - Owner, Founder, Community Manager [hr] [b][size=18pt]Credits[/size][/b]
Ridiculous (of Rune-Server) - Thread format (asked permission, he said yes) Our Alpha testers - Finding bugs [hr][/center]

item.title: [718/742] Athens - "Knowledge. Wisdom. Prosperity." - Official Release
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Nail_beast

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:57, topic:544124”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=663003.msg4442250#msg4442250 date=1407108478]

Monster drops were still never updates, this is a major flaw in the economy. Also, I can’t tell how you guys set up the charm drops but I just got a “snake charm” as a drop and I’m pretty sure that has nothing to do with summoning.
[/quote]Charms, related to Blue gold red green?

Snake charm isn’t related to summoning whatsoever.
http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Charms
Are the only charms.
Elder is new to me.[/quote]
This. In your revision there is only Gold, Green, Crimson, and Blue. The special charms should be obtained by their specific monsters.

Read full topic

item.title: [718/742] Athens - "Knowledge. Wisdom. Prosperity." - Official Release
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Elrick:

Talked to Arham about it and he said he just dumped the IDs. I guess it will do for now, but you guys should really look into eventually adding Pest Control and making some of the monsters drop their charms instead of every single monster. Make Nail Beasts a HIGH level slayer requirement. And clean up the drop IDs, it looks bad when out of nowhere you end up picking up Snake Charms from experiments.

Pest control was added literally 2 updates ago. Also, what’s a Nail Beast?

[hr]

[size=18pt]Updates of 8/3/2014 (August 3rd, 2014)[/size]

  1. New vote system. New vote rewards.
  2. Jungle Strykewyrms can now be found in the forest of Varrock.
  3. Yaks can be found in the place Rock crabs are (use fairy ring to get there).

Please note: We list NPC spawns as updates only in the thread to raise awareness, not the update log. Our update log contains only content!
[spoiler=Media]


[/spoiler]

Read full topic

item.title: [718/742] Athens - "Knowledge. Wisdom. Prosperity." - Official Release
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Talked to Arham about it and he said he just dumped the IDs. I guess it will do for now, but you guys should really look into eventually adding Pest Control and making some of the monsters drop their charms instead of every single monster. Make Nail Beasts a HIGH level slayer requirement. And clean up the drop IDs, it looks bad when out of nowhere you end up picking up Snake Charms from experiments.

Read full topic

item.title: [718/742] Athens - "Knowledge. Wisdom. Prosperity." - Official Release
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[size=18pt]Updates of 8/1/2014 (August 1st, 2014)[/size]

1. Summoning!
2. Pest Control!
3. Lords get sharks-only fishing spots at the Lord-only area.
4. The Lord-only training area got NPCs replaced. Instead of Lesser, greater, and black demons, they’ll find fire giants. Instead of jungle spiders and dagannoths, they’ll find 2 frost dragons.
[spoiler=Media]




[/spoiler]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:50, topic:544124”][size=18pt]Updates of 7/31/2014 (July 31st, 2014)[/size]

1. Hunger Games minigame!
2. Ice strykewyrms.
3. Jadinkos.
4. Gnome gliders
BUG FIX: 5. Scroll of Cleansing now is more proper.
BUG FIX: 6. Annoying fix. Slayer masters who are not your masters no longer assign you your current master’s assignments with the right click option.
[spoiler]



[/spoiler][/quote]
Haven’t been on for quite a while, but unless you stopped moving suggestions and bugs into the archive section, it would be nice to see some basic stuff still be added into the server.

Read full topic

[size=18pt]Updates of 7/21/2014 and 7/22/2014 (July 21st, 2014 and July 22nd, 2014)[/size]

1. Dungeoneering - Horde mode has been released.
2. Working on adding Dungeoneering rewards. Rewards completed so far:

[ul][]Bonecrusher
[]Gem bag
[]Twisted bird necklace
[]Coal bag
[]Scroll of cleansing
[]The longbow sight[/ul]

  1. Puro puro
  2. Notes system
  3. Jewelry stringing

item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[size=18pt]Updates of 7/10/2014 (July 10th, 2014)[/size]

  1. Spirit shield making
  2. Visage making (might not look that good)
    BUG FIX: 3. Runecrafting altars take you to their correct areas
    BUG FIX: 4. Runecrafting with rune essence no longer gives you a substantial amount of runes.
    BUG FIX: 5. You can now make 10 bolts with one bar, instead of 1 bolt with one bar in smithing.

    [/spoiler]

item.title: [718/742] Athens - "Knowledge. Wisdom. Prosperity." - Official Release
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:37, topic:544124”][size=18pt]Bury-all Option on Bones![/size]

You can now bury your bones using the bury-all option. Unfortunately, this does it at the same rate of the normal burying, but the bright side is that it saves you time. Right?

Credits to Elrick for the idea.[/quote]
Yay time to super-power level lol. Keep up the good work. I’ll probably get on at some point.

Read full topic
